authshield.title: §dWelcome to the server
authshield.subtitle: §ePlease type /login <password> to login
authshield.login.title: §c§lLogin Required
authshield.login.subtitle: §eUse /login <password> to play
authshield.login.too_many_attempts: §cToo many login attempts, please try again in %d minutes
authshield.register.password.needsymbol: §cPassword must contain at least one special character
authshield.register.password.needupper: §cPassword must contain at least one uppercase letter
authshield.register.password.neednumber: §cPassword must contain at least one number
authshield.changepassword.same: §cNew password cannot be the same as old password
authshield.unregister.no_permission: §cYou don't have permission to use this command
authshield.unregister.kick_message: §cYour registration has been removed by an admin
authshield.setfirstspawn.no_permission: §cYou don't have permission to use this command
authshield.setfirstspawn.success: §aSet initial spawn point for new players
authshield.reload.failed: §cFailed to reload configuration, check console for details
authshield.help.admin.setfirstspawn: §c/authshield setfirstspawn §7- Set initial spawn for new players
